data.name: Pokemon
data.description: a fictional element.
data.fullDescription: A game about catching wild animals and using them to fight with one another for social advancement in one's society.  To date, many successive iterations have been released.

data.name: Lugia
data.description: A Pokemon.
data.fullDescription: A legendary fictional animal that is featured in a full length film.  It's part of the second iteration of the games where animals are pitted against one another by human owners.

data.name: Pikachu
data.description: an electric rodent

data.description: A Pokemon that's a flying rooster.
